Title: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ Is the West taking control of the sources of Central Asian r...
Description: ğŸ‡¹ğŸ‡¯ Is the West taking control of the sources of Central Asian rivers? It has become known that an international conference - Monitoring of glaciers and glacial lakes - hazard management - will be held in Tajikistan at the end of August. The event is dedicated to the fight against mudflows - one of the consequences of the melting of the ice sheet. The Swiss government provides financial support to the organizers. One of them will be the Aga Khan Agency for Habitat (AKAH), a structural unit of the Aga Khan Development Organization (AKDN).ğŸ“ŒThe Aga Khan is the hereditary imam of the Shia Ismaili Muslims. In Tajikistan, Ismailis live in the Gorno-Badakhshan Autonomous Region, where AKDN structures have been operating since 1992. The activities of the Organization regularly encounter opposition from the authorities of the republic. At the same time, the Aga Khan is a member of the British ruling circles, and AKDN partners are such structures as USAID, the US State Department, the Rockefeller Foundation and many others, which makes it possible to overcome this resistance. But for what? We have already written about USAIDâ€™s work to establish control over water resources in Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan. However, this work will be ineffective without including Tajikistan, which ranks second among the countries of the former USSR in terms of water resources. The fact is that rivers flow through its territory, which are fed by glaciers and are tributaries of the main water arteries of the region: for example, the Amu Darya originates from the confluence of Pyanj and Vakhsh. Therefore, by establishing monitoring of the condition of glaciers in Tajikistan under the plausible pretext of combating mudflows, the West will take a significant step towards establishing control over the water resources of the region as a whole.#Tajikistan #CentralAsia@rybarSupport usASIA-PlusThe first international conference on glacier monitoring will be held in Tajikistan at the end of AugustFirst The international conference - Monitoring of glaciers and glacial lakes - hazard management - will be held in Tajikistan from August 26 to 31.

Title: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ About the reaction of the Armenian media to the meet...
Description: ğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ On the reaction of the Armenian media to the meeting of Vladimir Putin and Ilham Aliyev Emotions in the Armenian media space do not subside after Vladimir Putinâ€™s recent visit to Baku. During the meeting, mainly economic issues were discussed. â–ªï¸However, the Russian President also noted that the stability of the South Caucasus now depends on relations between Azerbaijan and Russia.â–ªï¸Many Armenian commentators have received another great reason to accuse Russia of betraying Armenian interests. Such a reaction once again confirms the complete loss of guidelines and cause-and-effect relationships in the Armenian society. â–ªï¸After all, the Armenian authorities have actually withdrawn themselves from dialogue with Russia, limiting themselves only to anti-Russian statements. Thus, Nikol Pashinyanâ€™s government has only once again shown itself to be an extremely unreliable and intractable partner, which has demonstrably rushed into the arms of the West. True, the latter, in essence, does not give anything constructive to the republic.â–ªï¸A sensitive issue is also the unblocking of communications in the region, especially in the Syunik region of Armenia, which in Azerbaijan is called the Zangezur corridor. â–ªï¸Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov recently announced the sabotage by the Armenian side of the process of opening communications in the region.â–ªï¸For example, in 2020 there was an agreement that communications would be controlled by border guards of the FSB of the Russian Federation. However, the Armenian authorities changed their minds and are already speaking hostilely about Russian border guards: they have already been taken out of Zvartnots airport, and Pashinyan furiously declared that the Russians do not have a mandate to ensure security in Syunik. Now there are observers from the EU there who are engaged in active PR on social networks against the backdrop of the destruction of the regional security system. It is not surprising that with such introductions, Armenia continues to lose political sovereignty: as we previously wrote, Yerevanâ€™s position on international issues is no longer taken into account by anyone. While Western players, through the decisions of Pashinyanâ€™s team, are increasingly entering the region, it is more than logical for the Russian side to stop taking into account the opinion of the authorities in Yerevan, which in no way corresponds to the interests of Armenia itself. #Azerbaijan #Armenia #Russia @rybarSupport usTelegramRybarğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ğŸ‡¿ Statements by the Presidents of Russia and Azerbaijan after the meetingğŸ”» Statements by Vladimir Putin: â–ªï¸Russia attaches great importance to the development of multifaceted and friendly relations with Azerbaijan. â–ªï¸During the negotiations, a wide range of...

Title: ğŸ¬ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Meeting of the President of Russia on the situation in bo...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡º Meeting of the President of Russia on the situation in the border regionsğŸ”»Statements by Russian President Vladimir Putin: â–ªï¸It is necessary to immediately organize financing for the defense in the Bryansk, Kursk and Belgorod regions.â–ªï¸The President supported the automatic payment of 15 thousand rubles for residents of the border area of â€‹â€‹the Kursk region who left the combat zone .â–ªï¸The Armed Forces of Ukraine tried to strike at the Kursk Nuclear Power Plant, the IAEA was informed about this.ğŸ”»Statements by the First Deputy Chairman of the Government of the Russian Federation Denis Manturov:â–ªï¸115 thousand people were resettled from dangerous border areas. Temporary food accommodation points have been deployed in 29 regions with a significant supply of places.â–ªï¸The Cabinet of Ministers has prepared a decision to allocate 858 million rubles to provide assistance to citizens in border regions due to the loss of property.â–ªï¸The Cabinet of Ministers has prepared a decision to allocate 1.9 billion rubles. for the Ministry of Emergency Situations due to the situation in the border regions.â–ªï¸Departments have been instructed to work out compensation for damage to industrial and agricultural enterprises in the Kursk region.â–ªï¸The Cabinet of Ministers will promptly supply special transport to the Belgorod region.ğŸ”»Statements by the Governor of the Belgorod Region Vyacheslav Gladkov:â–ªï¸Terrestrial defense regiments have been formed in the Belgorod region - about six thousand people.â–ªï¸The situation in the Belgorod region continues to remain difficult, 19 civilians have been injured over the past week.â–ªï¸Damage to agricultural enterprises in the Belgorod region from attacks by the Armed Forces of Ukraine is estimated at about 3 billion rubles.ğŸ”»Statements by the Acting Governor of the Kursk Region Alexei Smirnov:â–ªï¸To the evacuation zone in Kursk region, eight districts with a total population of 152 thousand people fell.â–ªï¸More than 130 thousand residents of the Kursk border region left, about 20 thousand people remained.â–ªï¸A decision was made to create a centralized regional emergency service for the Kursk region.â–ªï¸More than 41 thousand residents of the Kursk region were injured due to attacks by the Ukrainian Armed Forces, received various payments. Also, more than 200 certificates for resettlement were issued in the region - more than 400 people received them. Statements by the Governor of the Bryansk Region Alexander Bogomaz: The military defense of the Bryansk region has been formed, led by Major General of the Airborne Forces, the issue with weapons has been resolved. The situation at the site of the military clash with the Ukrainian DRG has been stabilized.#Belgorod #Bryansk #digest #Kursk #Russia@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Strengthening the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Pokr...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Strengthening the Armed Forces of Ukraine in the Pokrovsky direction: how an operational crisis neutralizes the advantages of the defensive lines of the Armed Forces of Ukraine - Rybar Analysis The rapid offensive of Russian troops in the Pokrovsky direction often meets fierce resistance from the enemy, who has equipped hundreds of kilometers of fortifications in the occupied part of the DPR. Most of the Ukrainian Armed Forcesâ€™ fortifications are platoon and company strongholds with a developed firing and camouflage system, which turns each assault on such a fortification into a separate operation. Sometimes Russian units encounter fortifications that are truly monstrous in size, playing the role of key defense centers of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. â–ªï¸A striking example of this is a large stronghold east of Zhelanny First, taken by the Russian Armed Forces during the fighting in this area in July. This defensive unit began to be built by the enemy, presumably shortly before the retreat of the Ukrainian Armed Forces from Avdeevka, and was supposed to become an impassable obstacle for Russian units due to its location and size. A large system of trenches and equipped firing points, located in an open field and covered by UAVs and artillery is indeed capable of stopping the advance of even large military formations for a long time in conditions of air superiority of various types of drones. Even smaller fortifications, with proper defense and well-established communication among units, are capable of holding back advances on entire sections of the front for years - Nevelskoye, located to the south, the battle for which lasted more than a year, is proof of this. ğŸ”»Nevertheless, a large stronghold east of Novoselovka First was successfully taken by Russian troops in less than a week of fighting. In conditions of an operational crisis and the inability of the command of the Armed Forces of Ukraine to competently build interaction between units, this defense center has turned into a huge target for Russian aviation and drones. An additional factor was the fact that the assault units of the Russian Armed Forces attacked the enemyâ€™s stronghold from the northeast, negating many of the advantages of the fortification, erected to hold back the advances of Russian troops from the east. Coordinates: 48.215605, 37.475699â–ªï¸Russian units met another large stronghold of the Ukrainian Armed Forces southwest of Timofeevka. Enemy fortifications were erected in the area of â€‹â€‹the C-05-09-07 highway and covered the crossing over Kazenny Torets, located in a populated area. The enemy's defensive unit was a system of trenches and firing points and, apparently, was adapted for all-round defense. In conditions of a stable front, such a line could stall the advance of Russian troops to Timofeevka and Lisichny and would require significant forces to take it. However, without established communication between units and UAV cover, the strong point was under threat of encirclement and was taken by the Russian Armed Forces within a few days. Coordinates: 48.276491, 37.479241ğŸ”»During the special operation, we have repeatedly witnessed how even smaller defensive lines held back the advance of advancing troops on one or another section of the front for a long time. Enemy fortifications in the Kupyansk-Svatovsky, Limansky and Seversky directions have been causing significant problems for the Russian Armed Forces for more than a year due to the geographical features of the area and the positional nature of the combat operations. However, many of the advantages of this kind of fortification are lost in conditions of an operational crisis, similar to what is happening with the Ukrainian Armed Forces in the Pokrovsky direction. Even the most powerful enemy defensive positions, in the absence of a sufficient number of infantry and support means to hold them, turn into an easy target for Russian attack aircraft. A separate problem for Ukrainian formations is the low moral and psychological state of the units, which are regularly exposed to attacks from Russian air forces and artillery and are forced to hold unfavorable positions. High resolution mapEnglish version#Pokrovsk #analysis #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: battles near Vishnevka and Komarov...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: battles near Vishnevka and Komarovkawhat is known as of 13:00 on August 22, 2024 In the Kursk region, fighting does not stop in several areas, the enemy is most actively trying to advance in the Korenevsky district.ğŸ”»In the Glushkovsky district the situation remains steadily tense . Ukrainian formations have not yet attempted to advance and are limiting themselves to attacks on populated areas south of the Seim River and crossings. ğŸ”»In the Korenevsky district, Ukrainian troops, apparently, were able to advance a little more last day than was initially known. At the same time, due to the terrain, Ukrainian armored vehicles could appear in a populated area, driving through Vishnevka or the 10th October tract from Apanasivka. At the same time, messages about the presence of the enemy appeared only in the context of Vishnevka - later messages about the complete control of the Ukrainian Armed Forces over the village were published on the Internet. There is relative calm in the Sudzhansky district. Russian troops are striking at identified enemy positions, and the Ukrainian Armed Forces are conducting engineering work in populated areas under their control. ğŸ”»In the Bolshesoldatsky district, according to Russian journalists, the settlement of Nechaevo and the surrounding area were liberated. At the same time, according to our data, the Ukrainian formations did not even enter the village itself, but were stopped in the Obruchye forest area, where they were subjected to several air strikes. Now, apparently, the forest has been cleared. ğŸ”»Meanwhile, the installation of reinforced concrete shelters began in Kursk. Zheleznogorsk and Kurchatov will also be equipped with standard modular buildings. High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Kursk #Russia #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Title: ğŸ–¼ ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions Another nig...
Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Raid of Ukrainian UAVs on Russian regions Another night, Ukrainian formations are launching drones into Russian rear regions. This time, according to the Russian Ministry of Defense, 28 drones were intercepted in six regions. â–ªï¸The main blow fell on the Volgograd region, where enemy UAVs tried to attack the Marinovka military airfield, where Su-24MR operational-tactical aircraft are also stationed. At the same time, hangars were previously installed at the facility itself, which made it possible to reduce the damage. A significant amount of on-site footage has appeared on the Internet, showing a hit on the airfield and a fire that broke out there. The attack also affected the Volgograd airport, where the reception and departure of aircraft were temporarily suspended. â–ªï¸In the Rostov region, Russian anti-aircraft gunners intercepted Ukrainian drones in the area of â€‹â€‹Novoshakhtinsk and Krasny Sulin. Apparently, the main target of the Ukrainian Armed Forces was the Morozovsk airfield, which at the beginning of the month came under fire from the Ukrainian Armed Forces. At the same time, in the region, the elimination of a fire on the territory of the Rosrezerv oil depot in the Proletarsky district, which arose as a result of an attack by an enemy UAV, has been ongoing for the fourth day. To date, firefighters have extinguished the fire in six tanks, but the total number of injured employees of the Russian Ministry of Emergency Situations has grown to 47 people. â–ªï¸In the Belgorod region, Ukrainian drones attacked the villages of Yasnye Zori and Veselaya Lopan: residential buildings were damaged, but there were no casualties. â–ªï¸Several more drones were intercepted in the Voronezh, Bryansk and Kursk regions - according to the latest information, no damage was recorded there. ğŸ”»In recent weeks, Ukrainian formations have literally carried out one massive raid after another, which clearly demonstrates the high volume of drone production from the enemy - yesterday the Armed Forces of Ukraine launched 45 drones, and already tonight about 30 more devices. At the same time, Ukrainian formations choose both military airfields and fuel and energy infrastructure facilities as their main targets. And, although most UAVs can be intercepted, a few drones often manage to reach their targets. And as we have repeatedly noted, in order to minimize damage and repel such raids, it is necessary to both build hangars and solve the difficulties with organization, interaction and control for intercepting UAVs moving along the same corridors. High resolution mapEnglish version#Belgorod #Bryansk #Voronezh #Volgograd #map #Kursk #Russia #Rostov #Ukraine@rybarSupport us

Several forest belts came under the control of the RF Armed Forces.ğŸ”»In addition, earlier, by August 18, Russian troops reached the Mylny pond in the Ikryannaya gully south of the dachas of the 3rd mine. At the same time, according to some reports, fighting in the dachas has already begun, but so far this has not been confirmed by objective monitoring personnel. ğŸ”»In the vicinity of Ugledar, the situation remains relatively stable. No attempts at advancement are recorded, and in Pavlovka and Yegorovka, Ukrainian formations carry out UAV strikes on identified places of presence of the Russian Armed Forces. If you have additions to the situation, you want us to highlight the successes of your unit, you can always write to us in the feedback bot @rybar_feedback_bot High resolution mapEnglish version#digest #map #Russia #Ukraine #Ugledar@rybarSupport us

Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª About Olaf Scholzâ€™s visit to Moldova  German Chancellor Olaf Scholz arrived in Chisinau for one day and held a meeting with President Maia Sandu. â–ªï¸The local press did not have high hopes for Scholzâ€™s visit and called it purely symbolic: a signal of support for Sandu before the presidential elections and referendum on European integration, which will take place on October 20. â–ªï¸Indeed, Scholz did not say anything new at a joint press conference with Sandu. He declared full support for Moldova on its path to the EU and against destabilization from Russia. â–ªï¸At the meeting they recalled how much Germany is investing in Moldova in connection with the Ukrainian crisis. â–ªï¸For example, Germany, together with France and Romania, has been participating in the Moldova Support Platform since 2022, through which Western countries pour hundreds of millions of dollars into the military and other needs of the country, thereby ensuring a stable anti-Russian course of the countryâ€™s leadership. Moreover, Moldova is the main transit hub for the supply of Western weapons for the Ukrainian Armed Forces and the export of Ukrainian grain. â–ªï¸In addition, Germany is also actively involved in the militarization of Moldova, supplying military equipment under the slogan of -countering the Russian threat.- ğŸ”»We can agree that Scholzâ€™s current visit to Moldova is purely symbolic and expresses support for Sanduâ€™s candidacy for re-election to a second term. Such a visit, for example, has already been made by US Secretary of State Antony Blinken. Germany also personifies the EU. So Scholz at the same time advertised the referendum on European integration to Moldovan society. #Germany #Moldova @rybarSupport usRealitatea.mdVIDEO Olaf Scholz, promisiune la ChiÈ™inÄƒu: Vom sprijini Republica Moldova din rÄƒsputeri-Vom sprijini Republica Moldova din rÄƒsputeri-. Title: ğŸ” #Summary morning of August 22, 2024 â–ªï¸ At night, the enemy's r...
Description: Forwarded From Two Majors#Summary morning of August 22, 2024â–ªï¸ At night, the enemyâ€™s rear areas were under attack from our -Geraniums-. Explosions were heard in the Kyiv, Cherkassy, â€‹â€‹Poltava, Nikolaev, and Odessa regions.â–ªï¸UAVs of the Ukrainian Armed Forces attacked the Marinovka military airfield in the Kalachevsky district of the Volgograd region at night; footage of the fire was distributed online. Enemy drones of this type were shot down over the Bryansk, Rostov, and Voronezh regions. A missile was shot down over the Kursk region.â–ªï¸On the Bryansk section of the State border near the settlement. Zabrama Klimovsky district yesterday the enemy's group tried to break through the border, but with skillful actions it was repulsed by border guards and attached units, and suffered losses. Our intelligence warned about the concentration of sabotage units of the Main Intelligence Directorate for a long time, but this time we managed to take early measures.â–ªï¸ In the Kursk region, the group of forces - North - reports that the past 24 hours were marked by the destruction of a Ukrainian Su-27, which tried to attack infrastructure facilities in the Kursk region. In the Korenevo direction, the enemy increased efforts to capture the settlement. Komarovka, having made 4 unsuccessful attempts to attack the settlement. While repelling the attacks, up to 40 Ukrainian Armed Forces militants, 2 armored fighting vehicles and infantry fighting vehicles were destroyed. Attacks of the Ukrainian Armed Forces on the village were repelled. Malaya Loknya, Cherkasy Porechnoye, Russkoye Porechnoye and Russian Konopelka. The enemy is also active near Vishnevka, Krasnooktyabrsky, Olgovka, Kremyanoy, Sheptukhovka, Cossack Loknya, Russkoye Porechnoye, Martynovka, Russkaya Konopelka and Pushkarny. Heavy fighting is underway.â–ªï¸ In the Pokrovsky direction, the Russian Armed Forces continue offensive operations and build on their success. Ptichye, beyond the village, came under the control of the Russian Army. Battles have begun in Kalinovo.â–ªï¸ In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction there are battles near the highway to Ugledar. â–ªï¸ On the Zaporozhye front, without significant changes, there is some intensification of enemy drones, of which there are already many, as well as artillery strikes of the Ukrainian Armed Forces. Identified clusters of the Ukrainian Armed Forces are being destroyed by artillery and aviation fire.â–ªï¸ In the Kherson direction and in Crimea, our troops are increasing their vigilance against the backdrop of expected provocations by Kyiv, timed to coincide with public holidays of the Kyiv regime.â–ªï¸ In the Belgorod region at night, the Ukrainian Armed Forces shelled Shebekino, a civilian was injured. During the day, as a result of multiple enemy strikes, four more civilians were injured.â–ªï¸ In the DPR, two people were killed, and another civilian was injured today as a result of enemy actions. In the village Oktyabrskoye Velikonovoselkovskogo district As a result of a motorcycle being blown up by an explosive object, women born in 1956 and 1960 were killed, a man born in 1958 was injured. The summary was compiled by: Two majors Telegram Two majors Bryansk region, Klimovsky district. Near the village Zabrama Around 19:00 the enemy tried to raid our squad near this settlement. According to primary data, 8 border guards and 10 fighters from the Akhmat unit took part in the battle. There was a shooting fight, and...

Description: ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Chronicle of a special military operation on August 21, 2024. Russian troops launched a series of attacks on various targets in enemy-controlled territory. Alarms sounded in eight so-called regions. Ukraine. In turn, the enemy also launched UAVs at targets on Russian territory; drones were shot down in the Moscow region and border regions. Fighting continues in the Kursk region. Ukrainian formations do not stop trying to advance in several areas. In Russkie Konopelki and Vishnevka, several groups of infantry with light armored vehicles were destroyed. In addition, according to some sources, a Su27 was shot down over the region. In the Pokrovsky direction, Russian troops continue to advance, liberating settlements occupied by the enemy. Ptichye came under the control of the Russian Armed Forces, and battles began for Kalinovo. In the Yuzhnodonetsk direction, successes of Russian troops were also recorded. Title: ğŸ–¼ â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: advance of the Ukrainian Armed For...
Description: â—ï¸ğŸ‡·ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¦ Kursk direction: advance of the Ukrainian Armed Forces near Snagost, which is known as of 20:00 on August 21, 2024. Personnel continue to arrive from the Kursk region, allowing us to significantly clarify the front line. ğŸ”»The status quo remains in the Glushkovsky district by the evening. The enemy strikes, but makes attempts to cross the state border, Russian troops are building pontoon crossings under fire from Ukrainian formations, and enemy aircraft continue to strike Tetkino.ğŸ”»Fighting continues in the neighboring Korenevsky district. Russian troops hold Korenevo firmly, but to the south the enemy, having passed Snagost, entered the neighboring village of Vishnevka in a column, where he was covered by UAV and artillery strikes. At the same time, based on the terrain and bridges, the Ukrainian formations could not enter Vishnevka without controlling Snagost, which confirms the absence of the Russian Armed Forces in the village. â–ªï¸The status of Apanasovka, Vezapny and Byakhovo remains in question. The enemy at least entered the first two, but Byakhovo did not appear in the reports either under anyoneâ€™s control or in the context of shelling. Viktorovka and Uspenovka, cut off by the Blyakhovets River, most likely remain in the gray zone if they are not controlled by the enemy. ğŸ”»There are also battles in the Sudzhansky district. Enemy forces in Borki and Spalny are subject to multiple attacks, but apparently, the settlements have not yet been liberated from Ukrainian forces. At the same time, Russian troops do not stop launching artillery and air strikes on the border territory of the Sumy region, where the enemy still operates large concentrations of personnel and equipment. Description: ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡± Situation in Mali: WHO in the north and fighting in the center of the country Summary for August 1 - 21, 2024 After the attacks on Tin-Zautin, patrols in the adjacent territories also intensified. Thus, the Malian army, with the support of the PMC - Wagner - carried out raids in some villages, where militant informants and weapons were found. After reconnaissance, the convoys returned with prisoners.â–ªï¸The center of the country is also uneasy - in the Mopti region. The bombings of government vehicles continued along the -road of death- from Duentza to Gossi. Also in the vicinity, Islamists attacked an army convoy that was traveling to Diallasaga. 15 soldiers were killed in the ambush.â–ªï¸Reconnaissance is being carried out along the Mauritanian border in order to identify militant cells and eliminate them. But the territory of Mauritania was again used by militants from the al-Qaeda-affiliated group JNIM as a rear base for raids on Malian territory. Along the border they attacked two army posts, from where the soldiers fled, leaving behind their weapons.ğŸ”»All this once again highlights the problems of the Malian armed forces. Of course, the government is increasing the number of personnel, but due to the lack of officers, the effectiveness of the reinforcements is extremely low. This problem directly affects our interests in the country. Thus, during a telephone conversation between the heads of the Russian and Mali Foreign Ministries, Lavrov said that Russian structures are ready to help increase the combat capability of the army. Most likely, these words mean the deployment of the Afrika Korps, which has been expected in the country for more than a month.
